pkgmetadata.longdescription:
adviz================Get startd quickly and see exmaples below## Install``` shpip install adviz```## How to useCount unique values in a list of items``` pythonimport advizimport pandas as pd`````` pythonadviz.value_counts_plus(list('aaaaaaaaabbbbcccddddddddddeeeeeeeeeeeeffffggghhhiijjjjkkkllllmmmmmmmnnooop'))```
